post.title: Dance Dance Revolution A3 adds Kanaria's KING, Yoidore Shirazu
post.content:
Konami's Dance Dance Revolution A3 on Twitter announced the addition of Kanaria's hit track KING as well as Yoidore Shirazu. Both songs were added to the game from 10:00am JST on Wednesday, August 10, 2022.

【新規楽曲追加！】
8月10日(水)10:00(JST)より、新規楽曲「KING / Kanaria」「酔いどれ知らず / Kanaria」が追加されます。#DDR_A3https://t.co/jWMRPfhbE5 pic.twitter.com/AjnDdurKej

— DDRチーム【公式】 (@DDR_573) August 10, 2022

KING, which rose to popularity as a song covered by a lot of VTubers, was released in August 2020. Currently, the original music video has reached more than 60 million views on YouTube. VTubers can catch up in making their cover of the song as this is available on Piapro.

Yoidore Shirazu, released in May this year, had its music video illustrated by renowned artist LAM (who also illustrated character designs for Kureiji Ollie, Vox Akuma, Fulgur Ovid, RPR, Kujou Ringo among others). Currently, its music video has reached over 8 million views on YouTube.

Banner Photo from DDRチーム【公式】 on Twitter

post.description: Konami's Dance Dance Revolution A3 on Twitter announced the addition of Kanaria's hit track KING as well as Yoidore Shirazu. Both songs were added to the game from 10:00am JST on Wednesday, August 10, 2022.

node.description: Murasaki Shion from Hololive has released a new single titled 'Chandelier'. The track is produced and written by popular Vocaloid producer Kanaria.
